title: Napa Valley Getaway
seo_title: Napa Valley Getaway | Wine Country Inn
seo_description: Escape the “real world” and take a break with a stay at the Wine Country Inn. Enhance your stay with this Napa Valley Getaway Package.
short_description: Escape the “real world” and take a break with a stay at the Wine Country Inn. Enhance your stay with this Napa Valley Getaway Package.
long_description:
Escape the “real world” and take a break with a stay at the Wine Country Inn. Enhance your stay with this Napa Valley Getaway Package. It includes a split Napa Valley wine and local Napa Valley culinary bites to enjoy in your gorgeous room. Each Friday and Saturday evening our guests enjoy a complimentary wine and cheese tasting served in the Winery House, hosted by a local vintner. Refuel with a delicious and complimentary Wine Country breakfast each morning.

Package Includes:

  • Split of Napa Valley Wine in your room upon arrival
  • Culinary bites in your room upon arrival
  • Wine Country Breakfast each morning
  • Weekend Wine Tasting served in the Winery House hosted by a local vintner
